mapper.select: select id, city_id, user_id, name, phone_number, gender, id_card, ic_front_image_url, ic_back_image_url, health_certificate_image_url, rating, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, del_flag from patient_escort_list where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into patient_escort_list(city_id, user_id, name, phone_number, gender, id_card, ic_front_image_url, ic_back_image_url, health_certificate_image_url, rating, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, del_flag) values (#{cityId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{gender}, #{idCard}, #{icFrontImageUrl}, #{icBackImageUrl}, #{healthCertificateImageUrl}, #{rating}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, 0, 0)

insert into patient_escort_list(city_id, user_id, name, phone_number, gender, id_card, ic_front_image_url, ic_back_image_url, health_certificate_image_url, rating, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, del_flag) values
(#{entity.cityId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.phoneNumber}, #{entity.gender}, #{entity.idCard}, #{entity.icFrontImageUrl}, #{entity.icBackImageUrl}, #{entity.healthCertificateImageUrl}, #{entity.rating}, #{entity.createBy}, now(), #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, 0, 0)

insert into patient_escort_list(city_id, user_id, name, phone_number, gender, id_card, ic_front_image_url, ic_back_image_url, health_certificate_image_url, rating, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, del_flag) values
(#{entity.cityId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.phoneNumber}, #{entity.gender}, #{entity.idCard}, #{entity.icFrontImageUrl}, #{entity.icBackImageUrl}, #{entity.healthCertificateImageUrl}, #{entity.rating}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.delFlag})
on duplicate key update city_id = values(city_id), user_id = values(user_id), name = values(name), phone_number = values(phone_number), gender = values(gender), id_card = values(id_card), ic_front_image_url = values(ic_front_image_url), ic_back_image_url = values(ic_back_image_url), health_certificate_image_url = values(health_certificate_image_url), rating = values(rating), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), status = values(status), del_flag = values(del_flag)
mapper.update:
update patient_escort_list
city_id = #{cityId},
user_id = #{userId},
name = #{name},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber},
gender = #{gender},
id_card = #{idCard},
ic_front_image_url = #{icFrontImageUrl},
ic_back_image_url = #{icBackImageUrl},
health_certificate_image_url = #{healthCertificateImageUrl},
rating = #{rating},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
status = #{status},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
